abstract: Laurence D. Fink, the leading candidate to become the head of Merrill Lynch, has met with the executive search firm responsible for filling the position, according to a person briefed on the discussions.
snippet: Laurence D. Fink, the leading candidate to become the head of Merrill Lynch, has met with the executive search firm responsible for filling the position, according to a person briefed on the discussions.
lead_paragraph: Laurence D. Fink, chairman and chief executive of BlackRock and the leading candidate to take over the job as head of Merrill Lynch, has met with the executive search firm responsible for filling the brokerage firm’s top seat, according to a person briefed on the discussions.

headline.main: BlackRock Chief Is Said to Be Meeting Over Merrill
headline.print_headline: BlackRock Chief Is Said to Be Meeting Over Merrill

abstract: Laurence D. Fink, chairman and chief executive of BlackRock and the leading candidate to take over the job as head of Merrill Lynch, has met with the executive search firm responsible for filling the brokerage firm’s top seat, The New York Times reported.
lead_paragraph: Laurence D. Fink, chairman and chief executive of BlackRock and the leading candidate to take over the job as head of Merrill Lynch, has met with the executive search firm responsible for filling the brokerage firm’s top seat, The New York Times reported.

headline.main: BlackRock Chief Is Said to Be Meeting Over Merrill
